column1: Smoque BBQ////It was great before all the hype and it's still great.  Their brisket is awesome as is their sauce which is handed over in small containers for you to distribute as you wish.  I don't particularly recommend the brisket or pulled pork sandwiches because you can't really get all that BBQ flavor through the flavorless pieces of bread.  I'm also just not a big fan of going to BBQ places and getting pulled pork sandwiches
column2: but especially here.  The mac&cheese beats out most of the other sides
column3: but the beans are still a must.  The interior can get pretty packed around peak times
column6: I dropped my food and they replaced it within 30 seconds
column7: with no additional charge.I don't recommend doing this
column8: it was just a nice thing they did for me.
